issue.title: Uniformize backend menus
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

To prepare Joomla 3.4.x compatibility, we should uniformize backend menus using Joomla! helpers.
Some components use the correct helpers (the majority), some doesn't : (core and monitor).

See the differences in the screenshots.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Hélène !
We talked about and accepted this entry on last COTEC, I think we forgot to change its status.
Can you change it ?

Thanks

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Of course!
